meanings.definition: Showing a lack of courage or determination; timidly.
meanings.sent1: The pusillanimous puppy cowered in the corner during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: She always acted pusillanimously when faced with a difficult decision.
meanings.sent3: The pusillanimous squirrel was too scared to gather nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His pusillanimous behavior in the face of danger was disappointing.
meanings.sent5: The pusillanimous knight refused to face the dragon, trembling in fear.

meanings.definition: In a cowardly or fearful manner.
meanings.sent1: He ran pusillanimously from the spider, screaming for help.
meanings.sent2: She spoke pusillanimously, avoiding any confrontation.
meanings.sent3: The cat pusillanimously hid under the bed from the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The politician pusillanimously avoided taking a stand on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The child pusillanimously refused to go into the dark basement alone.
